name: Flamel; The Adventures Of The Immortal Alchemist
name_original: Flamel; The Adventures Of The Immortal Alchemist
description:
This being worked on and is pretty bad in it's current state but it will grow this is just so you guys can test and give me feedback

I really need to change the ground tiles im experimating with the art

As of  7. 6. '18,  6 pm 

fixed the bugbut still need to upload the new version will try to do this today

FIXED

Controlls are ZQSD, arrow or WASD for movement

Left Click to shoot !

RMB to dash

R to reload

E to open chests 

E to pickup weapons, on the top-left of the screen you have dots for how many weapons you are holding and you use the space bar to change the weapon
